624.question: Does the algorithm improve on the state-of-the-art methods?

4-Table2-1.png: Yes, the algorithm improves on the state-of-the-art methods as it has higher accuracy percentages in most cases compared to the mentioned methods.</s>

Yes, the algorithm improves on the state-of-the-art methods. For instance, it achieves a LID accuracy of 99.30%, which is higher than the 97.74% achieved by the best-known method, 'Johlin et al. (2017)'.</s>
